synopsis.text: Arc Kibou-hen, the concluding chapter of the Danganronpa 3 anime series, brings the Hope's Peak saga to a thrilling end. In the aftermath of the Final Killing Game and the unveiling of the true mastermind, the Future Foundation lies in ruins. A desperate scheme emerges from one of the survivors, aiming to eradicate despair forever. The remaining Future Foundation members must unite to thwart this catastrophic plan, finding unexpected support from an unlikely group of allies. As they race against time to save their world, the players in this relentless death game grapple with the profound meanings of despair, hope, and redemption. Following the events of Mirai-hen, Kibou-hen concludes the Hope's Peak storyline in the Danganronpa series. Additionally, the Despair Arc, set before the first season, delves into a tale of despair with Hajime Hinata, while the Future Arc continues after Danganronpa 2: Goodbye Despair, following Makoto Naegi in a new deadly game.
